allow: Bash(then venv/Scripts/python manage.py shell -c "from schooladmin.models import GradeSummary; gs = GradeSummary.objects.get(student__username=''paulnwosu541'', subject__name=''Data science''); print(f''Attendance: {gs.attendance_score}''); print(f''Assignment: {gs.assignment_score}''); print(f''Test: {gs.test_score}''); print(f''Exam: {gs.exam_score}''); print(f''Total in DB: {gs.total_score}''); expected = float(gs.attendance_score) + float(gs.assignment_score) + float(gs.test_score) + float(gs.exam_score); print(f''Expected: {expected}''); print(f''FIXED: {abs(float(gs.total_score) - expected) < 0.01}'')")
